roleset.name: separated; suffering disunity

roles.note: Arg0 differs from the verb frame in that it is more likely to be a subject matter/cause than agent. Arg3 not present in the verb frame.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: The House and Senate are divided over whether the United Nations Population Fund will receive any portion of these appropriations , but the size of the increase is itself significant .
example.arg: over whether the United Nations Population Fund will receive any portion of these appropriations

example.text: Loyalties are divided between teachers and patient
example.note: In this context, the experiencer is torn between loyalty to patients and loyalty to teachers.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WSJ data. Corresponds to VNcls separate-23.1-1, other_cos-45.4.
